known_issues: Domain name was unintentionally added/embedded in the app and needs to be removed.

existing_features.title: Remove the in-app domain configuration flow so the app UI no longer prompts users to pick/apply a domain slug or displays any applied domain URL inside the app.

Clean up unused domain-related frontend code paths after removing the domain UI entry point (components/hooks/utilities) so the frontend builds without unused-import/lint errors and no longer makes domain-related backend calls from the UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove/revert the domain name that was added inside the app (was not intended to be included in-app UI/content).

projectName: Remove in-app domain name/domain configuration UI
